title: WTB: Last T201 for the set: Lajoie/Falkenberg
author: freakhappy

posts.post_title: WTB: Last T201 for the set: Lajoie/Falkenberg
posts.post_content:
Looking for the last T201 to complete my set...Lajoie/Falkenberg

Who wants to be the one that puts an end to this great set I've been collecting for over four years?  I'm looking for mainly a graded example in PSA/SGC 2-4 range with decent appeal.  I am picky about a few things, but I'll wait to see any pics before I start dissecting ;)

Please let me know what you got...I'd love to finish this bad boy very soon!  

Thanks in advance for helping,

Mike
